MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY10  postcode area of Oswestry affecting properties in Porthywean and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:4AM  on 26th December 2020.
